name: Battermill Inc.
description:
Battermill Inc.

(This game was made for the Sonicworkflow's Valentine's Day Jam, and all assets was made in the duration of the jam, besides the real-life photo of an building we drew over)

So despite what everyone told you, you finally got a job! Only problem now is that you have literally infinite of new co-workers, and you haven't really talked to anyone in months. And no, your mother does not count. But take a deep breath, relax and smile a bit. What's the worst thing that could happen?

Getting fired, probably.

Battermill Inc. is a 2D memory/casual game where you have to try not to cringe your co-workers as you walk around the office, making the proper hand-shake and trying your best not to cringe out anyone,  and make yourself anxious!
